EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_San Jose_Strata_Q115.Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Strata!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thanks for visiting Pivotal at Strata + Hadoop World in San Jose. What a great show!
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Awesome Sessions – Including Rock Star Data Science in 2015 <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/schedule/detail/41132>, Pro Bono Data Science in Action – Helping Teens in Crisis <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/schedule/detail/38228>, Big Data vs. Climate Change <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/content/solutions-showcase> and A New Approach to Big Data <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/schedule/detail/40699>. - Powerful Interviews – Leo Spiegel <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y2Ng3Mj80v4> and Sunny Madra <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AOUiyMBO3BI> were both interviewed on theCUBE. Sunny <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jB2igkDwZEs> also spoke with O'Reilly Editor. - Insightful Posts – Read blogs about the enhancements to Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/pivotal-big-data-suite-open-agile-cloud-ready> and Pivotal's role in the Open Data Platform (ODP) initiative <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal/p-o-v/open-data-platform-initiative-putting-an-end-to-faux-pen-source-apache-hadoop-distributions>. - Important Announcements – Pivotal’s A New Approach to Big Data <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data> executive briefing page is now available.
Want more? Come see Pivotal in action at a Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow> near you.
Pivotal is excited to be a part of how data is shaping the future. Please visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io/> to learn more about Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> and join the revolution: enterprise transformation through agile data.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
